snippet.title: Mato Anomalies - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
In this stylistic and truly original JRPG, the player slips into the role of detective Doe to uncover the deepest secrets behind the invasion of supernatural creatures in Mato – a sprawling metropolis that combines traditional with futuristic architecture in a post-apocalyptic world. The game is slated for release in 2023 on PlayStation® 4 and PlayStation® 5.

#ps5games #ps4games
